alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 09 at 2:49AM PST until December 11 at 5:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 9 inches. Heaviest snow will be Highway 20 southward. The mountains will see 10 to 20 inches of snow. * WHERE...Chesaw Road, Highway 20 Wauconda Summit, Boulder Creek Road, Republic, Sherman Pass, Inchelium, and Wauconda. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 5 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
